title: PHOTO: Pilot Draws Heart over Iceland to Honor Healthcare Workers
description: An Icelandair pilot used his plane Sunday to thank healthcare workers battling the coronavirus pandemic in Reykjavík, Iceland.
content:
An Icelandair pilot used his plane Sunday to thank healthcare workers battling the coronavirus pandemic in Reykjavík, Iceland.
While transporting medical supplies from Shanghai, China, to Iceland’s capital city, the anonymous pilot came up with a unique idea… [+2301 chars]
